Project Overview

Full vehicle modeling project created entirely in Maya, focusing on clean topology, realistic proportions, and detailed mechanical elements.

Key Accomplishments

  • Modeled complete car from reference images with accurate proportions
  • Created clean quad topology optimized for potential animation
  • Detailed both interior and exterior components
  • Applied realistic materials and lighting setups
  • Demonstrated technical proficiency in hard-surface modeling

Tech Used

Maya
